entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Webequie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:43 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -17.1°C

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
